rules.natural: If the virus outbreak causes school closures, then the health agency contains the crisis situation
If the monsoon season occurs, then the health agency contains the crisis situation
If emergency services activate flood response, then should the weather service monitor the monsoon season, either drought conditions occur or the monsoon season occurs
If flooding causes evacuation orders, then the health agency contains the crisis situation
Either flooding causes evacuation orders or flooding causes shelter openings
If the virus outbreak causes business shutdowns, then the health agency contains the crisis situation

rules.prover9_expression: (activates(government, emergency_fund) | (-(coordinates(emergency_services, relief_operations) -> (causes(flooding, shelter_openings) -> contains(health_agency, crisis_situation))) -> requests(government, international_aid)))
rules.natural: Either the government activates the emergency fund or, provided that emergency services coordinating relief operations does not lead to flooding causing shelter openings resulting in the health agency containing the crisis situation, then the government requests international aid
If the government authorizes emergency powers, then emergency services activate flood response
If the research team develops an updated vaccine, then the research team develops a new treatment
If the research team monitors disease patterns, then should neither drought conditions occur nor the monsoon season occur, the health agency does not issue new guidelines
If the virus outbreak triggers emergency response, then either the virus outbreak causes school closures or the virus outbreak causes business shutdowns
If the research team develops a vaccine prototype, then the regulatory body approves the vaccine prototype
If the government initiates a distribution network, then the government initiates mass production
If neither drought conditions occur nor the monsoon season occurs, then the health agency issues new guidelines
If the government declaring a state of emergency does not lead to emergency services activating flood response, then the military deploys relief efforts
If the government declaring a state of emergency does not lead to emergency services activating flood response, then the military does not deploy relief efforts
If the government declaring a state of emergency does not lead to the government authorizing emergency powers, then the government does not implement a curfew
If the health agency implementing quarantine zones does not lead to the health agency implementing travel restrictions, then the research team develops a vaccine prototype
If the research team developing a vaccine prototype does not lead to the regulatory body not approving the vaccine prototype, then the government initiates a distribution network
If the research team developing a vaccine prototype does not lead to the regulatory body not approving the vaccine prototype, then the government does not initiate mass production

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(declares(government, state_of_emergency) -> authorizes(government, emergency_powers)) -> implements(government, curfew)) -> suspends(government, civil_liberties))
rules.natural: If the government not declaring a state of emergency leading to the government authorizing emergency powers does not result in the government implementing a curfew, then the government suspends civil liberties

rules.prover9_expression: (-(-(declares(government, state_of_emergency) -> authorizes(government, emergency_powers)) -> implements(government, curfew)) -> -suspends(government, civil_liberties))
rules.natural: If the government not declaring a state of emergency leading to the government authorizing emergency powers does not result in the government implementing a curfew, then the government does not suspend civil liberties
If emergency services not activating flood response does not lead to disease mutation not occurring, then the research team develops an updated vaccine
If emergency services do not activate flood response, then disease mutation occurs
If the health agency does not contain the crisis situation, then the health agency implements quarantine zones
If the health agency does not contain the crisis situation, then the health agency does not implement travel restrictions
